sections.title: Overview
sections.content: ERTG Writer is designed to simplify the process of creating and managing chapters for Erainor RPG. This guide will introduce you to the main functionalities accessible from the main menu, File menu, and Documentation page.

sections.title: Main Menu
sections.content:
The main menu provides two key options:
  • Create New Chapter: Start a fresh chapter writing project.
  • Open Chapter: Open an existing chapter file for editing.

sections.title: File Menu
sections.content:
The File menu offers the following options:
  • New Chapter: Start a new chapter, discarding any unsaved changes.
  • Open Chapter: Open an existing chapter file for further editing.
  • Save Chapter: Save the current chapter. If it's the first time saving a new chapter, this option will behave like 'Save As', allowing you to specify a file location. Remember that the tool will automatically fill out the correct name of the file based on the numerical chapter ID you entered. If you're working on an existing chapter, it will simply update the file with any new changes.

sections.title: Help Menu
sections.content:
The Help menu consists of the following options:
  • About: Displays information about the application.

sections.title: Documentation Page
sections.content: The Documentation button is located in the top right of the writer view. Clicking it opens a dockable window containing the Table of Contents for the application's documentation. It is not GUI-blocking, allowing continued interaction with the application.
